article.title: Valorant Mobile Beta Expands to New Regions
article.excerpt: Riot Games is expanding the Valorant Mobile beta into additional regions, giving more players access to the upcoming mobile tactical shooter.
article.content:
Riot Games has officially announced new regions joining the Valorant Mobile beta, marking a major milestone in the gameâ€™s development. Early testers have praised the smooth controls, impactful sound design, and faithful adaptation of PC abilities.

With new regions being invited, Riot is gathering broader feedback to refine balance, optimize performance, and ensure the competitive experience remains intact across devices. As excitement builds, fans worldwide continue waiting for news of a global launch date, which now seems closer than ever.
